participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, often finds solace in music and deep conversations.
participant_1.background: I have a hard time with my family, but I'm doing my best to work things out. I try to wash my clothes at least once a week. I play the guitar to express the thoughts that my weird mind can't. My longest relationship was four years and I'm not sure if I'm ready for another one. My favorite food is popcorn.

participant_2.name: Matt
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and whimsical, enjoys creative pursuits and has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I will go to Comic Con if I can wear my favorite hoodie. I love to swim. When I am stressed, I overeat. If I were to be reincarnated, I would want to come back as a hippopotamus. I often think about quitting my job and becoming a roadie for Justin Bieber.

content.text: Hi, my name is Matt. What about you?
I'm participant_1. What do you do for fun?
I love swimming and going to Comic Con! What about you?
I love to play guitar and spend time with my family.
That's great! I've always wanted to learn how to play guitar.
It's a lot of fun! It can be really therapeutic. What do you like to do when you're stressed?
I love to swim or eat food. I'm not sure if that's a healthy coping mechanism, but it works for me!
Haha, I can relate to that. I love to eat popcorn when I'm stressed.
Popcorn is one of my favorite foods too! I love the way it tastes and smells.
Me too! It's so yummy. What's your favorite thing to do at Comic Con?
I love dressing up in costumes and meeting new people. It's so much fun to be around people who love the same things you do.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to Comic Con before, but I've always wanted to go.
You should totally go! It's so much fun and you'll meet some really cool people.
